name: anime_website
description: The Anime Project is a web application designed to track and manage anime series, manga, and related characters. It provides users with the ability to create accounts, add series to their watchlists, browse through a comprehensive database of anime and manga, and view detailed information about each series and character.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "cd backend && npm run start"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
